message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $12000 is a bit too low for me at this time. I'm willing to come down to $13000 to make this work. Let me know your thoughts on this offer.
